name: Curried Pea Rostis Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 160Â°C. In a bowl, mix the eggs with the baking powder and add the prepared vegetables to the mix.
Pack the mix into small hand size patties and shallow fry with the olive oil for 2 minutes each side.
Carefully remove the patties from the shallow fry, transfer to a baking tray and bake for 10 minutes.
